script:
1). I thought Cynthia was the department head.
No, she's just an assistant. 
Let's head up the department.
I thought that you're wrong.
2). Who's not available to come in on Saturday?
Pieter and Jane are available.
Geoff, Missy, and Brandon. 
Lance can't make it on Sunday.
3). Excuse me, do you know when the next train leaves for Detroit?
It leaves from platform three.
It stops first in Cleveland.
It departs in forty minutes.
